posts.description:
I shall no longer allow negative thoughts or feelings to drain me of my energy. Instead I shall focus on all the good that is in my life. I will think it, feel it and speak it. By doing so I will send out vibes of positive energy into the world and I shall be grateful for all the wonderful things it will attract into my life.
#positivevibesonly💯

She asked, 'You are in love, what does love look like?' to which I replied, 'Like everything I've ever lost came back to me.'-Nayyrah Waheed 💓
#wherethereislovethereislife

#danielwellington

Life is amazing. And it's awful. And then it's amazing again. 
And between the amazing and the awful it's ordinary and mundane and routine. 
Breathe in the amazing, hold on through the awful, and relax and exhale during the ordinary. 
That's just living heartbreaking, soul-healing, amazing, awful, ordinary life. And it's breathtakingly beautiful.- LR Knost 💐
#thereissomuchtosmileabout
#lavitaebella

.
This Easter, some bunny wants you to know that #RabbitsAreNotToys! They're small and cute but they're also living and breathing creatures who come with a big responsibility. They can live up to ten years and deserve to have the same love, care and attention we give to other beloved pets. 🐰💕
#SpreadTheWord #SaveTheBunnies
.

Every year, thousands of rabbits are abandoned to shelters or released outdoors where they will likely die. Up to 95% of "Easter Bunnies" don't make it to the age of 1. If you're thinking of buying a bunny, how about a stuffed toy or a chocolate one? 🍭🍫
#StuffedBunnyMovement #MakeMineChocolate
.

Please read about "why not buy a bunny for Easter" (link in bio) and then visit @houserabbitsociety 's website to learn more about these wonderful animals and to find out more about their rescue efforts. 🐰💕
#AdoptDontShop #RabbitRescue
. 🐰🐰
#BunniesUnited
#makemine🍫

.
The day you realize that there are so many tiny humans that need your voice 💭
.
Every two minutes, a child around the world is diagnosed with cancer 😔🌎👶🏻
Sadly, less than 4% of the National Cancer Institute's budget is solely dedicated to childhood cancer research.
.
This is our second year supporting our friend Luca as he shaves his head along with many others, to stand in solidarity with children fighting cancer. They do this through St. Baldricks, a nonprofit organization that raises money for childhood cancer research. Luca’s sister, Alessandra, is a brain cancer survivor. Luca is only 11 years old and has dedicated over half of his life already to raising awareness and money for pediatric cancer research. We aren't sure which is bigger, his heart or his determined spirit .. but both have completely inspired us to invite you to join us in helping him reach his goal by either sharing our post or donating to his link that's in our bio✌🏻
#nohairdontcare🙏🏻
#rockthebald 👶🏻
